title: Support for custom user fields, which are able to be passed into external application
author: vmario89
body_snippet:
Hi all,

i would like to be able to add custom user fields to provide more generic data passing (argument lists) into external application. At the current moment mRemoteNG has only one field name "Userfield", which can be passed by using %Userfield%. 
![grafik](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5631071/37990964-18a85a2a-3208-11e8-851e-9093008fab08.png)

Maybe this could be implemented together with https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/issues/571 because those fields could also be ...

iterations.description: The enhancement request is reasonable but lacks key implementation details such as custom field schema, UI behavior, persistence rules, and external-app token syntax.
This is a scoped enhancement request and the codebase already exposes multiple user field properties, so external-app token expansion can be extended safely.
